newsitem.title: TAIWAN: PRESS DIGEST - Taiwan newspapers - May 23.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Taiwan newspapers - May 23.

text.p: These are the leading stories in the Taiwan press on Friday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
CHINA TIMES - Justice ministry to revise law to increase penalties against criminals
Premier Lien Chan directs that future operation of National Health Insurance Programme be handed to private sector
UNITED DAILY NEWS - Second round of Taiwan-Hong Kong shipping talks to be held on Saturday, breakthrough seen
Taiwan to allow import of gravel from China
LIBERTY TIMES - National Health Insurance Program to be revised in mid-1998
COMMERCIAL TIMES - Hong Kong firms solicit Taiwan customers to uses HK mobile phone service through international roaming function
Philippines, Malaysia to call for more trade and investment with Taiwan
ECONOMIC DAILY NEWS - Central bank scraps ceiling on banks' foreign liabilities
Electricity rates for industrial clients to be raised by 27 percent in summer
